message: We have a good Initiative to make an Islamic Application that will allow us to find islamic Centers World Wide. The project is made as "Sadaka Gariah" for whoever wanna join. If you are interested send me your gmail so i can share with you the project document :) looking forward for a lot of Folks to join :)
